articles.title: Girl dies of H1N1 infection in Kerala - Deccan Herald
articles.description: A 12-year-old girl from Kozhikode district has died due to H1N1, health officials said here on Thursday. Her death was reported on Sunday but the lab results of her samples later confirmed that she was infected with the virus, they said. Her twin sister is al…
